item.description:
Allan Hughes, DC ,will once again be leading this teleseminar. Some of the points he'll talk about are --
Why are we here? Have we lived before? Where will we go after this life? Is our fate predestined?

What is the law of karma? How does it determine our fate? We canâ€™t change our past, but we can shape our future, starting from right now.

You don't have to leave your house for this program. Just pick up the phone. The call-in number is: 1-712-432-3900. When prompted, enter your access code: 1617505 followed by the # sign.

group.name: The Science of Spirituality Meditation Meetup

item.name: A Teleseminar: Karma and Reincarnation
